name: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY, petitioner, v. Michael BOLEN.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Michael BOLEN.
attorneys: Motion of Association of American Railroads for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Missouri, Eastern District denied.
casebody.head_matter:
BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Michael BOLEN.
No. 15-940.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 18, 2016.
Motion of Association of American Railroads for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Missouri, Eastern District denied.
